scripts.prebuild:all: node -e "fs.rmSync('./public', { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Cleaned public directory.');"
scripts.postbuild:all: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const apps = {'member-portal': 'member', 'login-app': 'login', 'entrenatech-dashboard': 'gym', 'superadmin-dashboard': 'admin'}; Object.entries(apps).forEach(([app, dest]) => { const srcDir = path.join('apps', app, 'dist'); const destDir = path.join('public', dest); if (fs.existsSync(srcDir)) { fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync(srcDir, destDir, { recursive: true }); console.log(`Copied ${app} to ${dest}`); } });"
scripts.deploy:firebase: npm run build:production && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:app-engine: npm run build:production && gcloud app deploy --project=entrenatech-prod-2024
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && npm run deploy:firebase && npm run deploy:app-engine
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build:production && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview --expires 7d
scripts.analyze: npm run build:all && npx vite-bundle-analyzer public/*/assets/*.js
scripts.test: npm run build:all && npm run lint && npm run type-check
